channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: A-Troupe reels from the news that they have lost their best dancer and turn to a familiar face to replace them. As Emily mulls over her enticing offer, Nick makes a counter offer, making it impossible for Emily to decide. Piper worries that Finn?s chronic lateness may spell trouble for A-Troupe's chances at success.
